title: Statistical Inference for High-Dimensional Linear Regression with Blockwise Missing Data. (arXiv:2106.03344v2 [stat.ME] UPDATED)
abstract: Blockwise missing data occurs frequently when we integrate multisource or multimodality data where different sources or modalities contain complementary information. In this paper, we consider a high-dimensional linear regression model with blockwise missing covariates and a partially observed response variable. Under this framework, we propose a computationally efficient estimator for the regression coefficient vector based on carefully constructed unbiased estimating equations and a blockwise imputation procedure, and obtain its rate of convergence. Furthermore, building upon an innovative projected estimating equation technique that intrinsically achieves bias-correction of the initial estimator, we propose a nearly unbiased estimator for each individual regression coefficient, which is asymptotically normally distributed under mild conditions. translated_title: 高维线性回归中分块缺失数据的统计推断
translated_abstract: 分块缺失数据经常在整合多源或多模态数据时出现，其中不同的数据源或模态包含互补的信息。在本文中，我们考虑具有分块缺失协变量和部分观测响应变量的高维线性回归模型。在这个框架下，我们基于仔细构建的无偏估计方程和分块插补程序，提出了一个计算效率高的回归系数向量估计器，并得到了其收敛速度。此外，基于一种创新的投影估计方程技术，该技术在内在上实现了初始估计器的偏差校正，我们还提出了每个个体回归系数的几乎无偏估计器，在温和条件下渐近地服从正态分布。基于这些去偏估计器，可以建立渐近有效的置信区间和关于每个回归系数的统计检验。
tldr: 本文提出了一种针对高维线性回归模型中分块缺失数据的统计推断方法，通过构建无偏估计方程和分块插补程序，实现了回归系数向量的高效估计，同时提出了每个回归系数的几乎无偏估计器和相应的统计推断方法。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a statistical inference method for high-dimensional linear regression with blockwise missing data, which efficiently estimates the regression coefficient vector and provides nearly unbiased estimators and corresponding statistical inference methods for each regression coefficient.
